name: Save the Queen
description: In this short but very fun game, you have to do parkour in a dungeon to save the queen who was taken by the big bad guy but watch out for the dangerous lava that sends you back to the beginning no matter where you are. In this game, unlike most platformers, this one has absolutely no checkpoints so you have to watch your step every second. This game isn't too long but I will try to add updates once a week. once you complete the game you go to paradise. Who wouldn't want to live in paradise? This is my first game that I made so I Hope you enjoy.
